channel.title: [PI]adding quest tab commands[PI]
channel.description:
i want the quest tab to look like: [code=java]players: pk points: donator staus: venge runes (i want to make it so u can click and get venge runes) food(when clicked gives you food)(normal players would get shark,donators rocktails) info(gives a list of commands when clicked) [/code]
now i already have the food command working and giving donors rocktails and normal players shark also the veng command works along with the info command and ::players but how could i add the all this stuff the the quest tab i have no clue where to begin.
